title: Descender
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Descender**

The part of such letters as **g** , **j** , **p** , **q** , **y** that descends below the [baseline](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/baseline).
author: xensen
